name: Tiramisu
description: Classic Italian dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone, and cocoa.

name: Biscotti
description: Crunchy almond biscuits, perfect for dipping in coffee.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Rich chocolate cake, a classic treat with coffee.

name: Croissant
description: Flaky, buttery French pastry, a perfect coffee companion.

name: Cheesecake
description: Creamy cheesecake, delicious with a cup of coffee.

name: Cannoli
description: Crispy pastry tubes filled with sweet ricotta cream, a Sicilian favorite.

name: Madeleine
description: Soft, shell-shaped French sponge cakes, lightly sweet and perfect for dipping.

name: Pecan Pie
description: Sweet, nutty pie with a gooey filling and crisp pecans.

name: Baklava
description: Layers of flaky pastry, honey, and nuts. Sweet and rich, pairs well with coffee.

name: Apple Strudel
description: Austrian pastry with spiced apples and raisins wrapped in thin dough.

name: Opera Cake
description: Elegant French cake with layers of almond sponge, coffee buttercream, and chocolate ganache.

name: Macaron
description: Delicate French meringue sandwich cookies in assorted flavors.

name: Lemon Tart
description: Tangy lemon curd in a crisp pastry shell, a refreshing treat.

name: Coffee Cake
description: Moist cake with a cinnamon streusel topping, made to enjoy with coffee.

name: Pavlova
description: Crisp meringue shell with a soft center, topped with whipped cream and fruit.

name: Profiterole
description: Choux pastry balls filled with cream and topped with chocolate sauce.

name: Sachertorte
description: Austrian chocolate cake with apricot jam and a dark chocolate glaze.

name: Rum Baba
description: Small yeast cake soaked in rum syrup, sometimes filled with cream.

name: Financier
description: Almond-flavored French tea cake, moist and buttery.

name: Ricciarelli
description: Soft almond cookies from Siena, Italy, dusted with powdered sugar.

name: Sfogliatella
description: Shell-shaped Italian pastry with crisp layers and a sweet ricotta filling.

name: Churros
description: Fried dough pastry, crispy outside and soft inside, often served with chocolate.

name: Galette des Rois
description: French puff pastry cake with almond cream, traditionally served in January.

name: Pastel de Nata
description: Portuguese custard tart with a crisp, flaky crust and creamy filling.

name: Dobos Torte
description: Hungarian sponge cake layered with chocolate buttercream and topped with caramel.

name: Kardinalschnitte
description: Austrian dessert with layers of meringue, sponge cake, and whipped cream.

name: Florentine
description: Thin, crisp cookies with nuts, candied fruit, and chocolate.

name: Sablé
description: French shortbread cookie, buttery and crumbly.

name: Amaretti
description: Italian almond-flavored macaron-like cookies, crisp outside and chewy inside.

name: Éclair
description: Choux pastry filled with cream and topped with chocolate icing.

name: Zeppole
description: Italian fried dough balls, sometimes filled with custard or cream.

name: Panna Cotta
description: Silky Italian dessert made from sweetened cream and gelatin, often served with berries or caramel.

name: Crème Brûlée
description: Classic French custard dessert with a caramelized sugar crust.
